alert.note: Alert for Lower Plaquemines (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 7:03AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Plaquemines Parish through 730 AM CDT... At 702 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a waterspout over the marshes near Empire, or 10 miles southeast of Port Sulphur. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Waterspouts and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Waterspouts can easily overturn boats and create locally hazardous waters. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Boothville-venice, Boothville, Empire, Buras, Buras-triumph, Venice and Boothville Asos. WATERSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
